Check out iOS 14 concept with a new call interface
07 Nov 2019, 09:08 by Artyom Bausov
A blogger from The Hacker 34 posted a video demonstrating the iOS 14 concept.
According to the designers, Apple should implement the Split View split screen function and change the call interface. There are other minor changes, including updated icons for standard applications.


GIF Keyboard for iMessage



Split View Mode from iPadOS



Support for multiple Apple IDs on a single device



Drag & Drop Files Using Drag & Drop



Placement of icons anywhere on the desktop



Display apps on screen with Always-On-Display support

I would like to see at least half of these proposed functions. In particular, Always-On-Display.
iOS 14 concept shared today visualizes what some highly requested features from Apple customers could look like on iPhone including a new call screen UI that doesn? t take over the entire screen, Split View and drag and drop support, a truly customizable Home screen, always-on display with complications, and more.
